info.title: Support and company from volunteer mentors
info.description: In the Ylitse MentorApp peer mentoring service, mentors help you with your personal situation confidentially. You can choose a suitable mentor based on your problem and get help regardless of time and place.
info.bullet1: You can use the app anonymously and confidentially.
info.bullet2: The service is free of charge.
info.bullet3: You will meet people who have been in the same situation.
info.bullet3Bold: They know what you are talking about.

newMessages.title: You have unread messages
newMessages.text: If you want to return to previous conversations, unread messages are waiting for you in the chat.

admin.title: Manage user accounts
admin.text: Add, remove and edit actors and mentors, view statistics, use survey tools and manage keywords and other service features.

mentor.title: Chat with actors
mentor.text: Return to the conversations with the actors and write a message.

mentee.title: Chat with mentors
mentee.text: Return to the conversations with the mentors and write a message.

freshMentee.title: Start by finding a mentor
freshMentee.text: Browse mentor profiles or search by a specific keyword. Once you find a suitable mentor, you can start a conversation with them.

announcements.title: Announcements
announcements.notice1: The new version of Ylitse has been launched! Welcome!

concepts.title: What is Ylitse?
concepts.description: Here are some facts about the service.

concept1.name: Chat
concept1.definition: Chat with the same mentor for longer periods of time and get to know each other. You can agree on when and what you will discuss.

concept2.name: Security
concept2.definition: The service follows the principles of a safer space. Read about it here.

concept3.name: Mobile app
concept3.definition: You can also use the service with our mobile app, which is available on <a1>Google Play</a1> and <a2>App Store</a2>.

info.title: Peer support for young people and adults
info.text: You can talk to peer mentors about any issue weighing on your mind. A peer mentor can be a companion, guide, understanding listener, or coach for various situations in life.
